title: America's Crumbling Trendfrastructure 8/30: Twitter, Kid Rock, Google Play, Labor Unions, Macron, Elon Musk, Jackson
itunes:title: America's Crumbling Trendfrastructure 8/30: Twitter, Kid Rock, Google Play, Labor Unions, Macron, Elon Musk, Jackson
description:
In this edition of America's Crumbling Trendfrastructure, Jack and Miles discuss Twitter's new "Circle" feature, Kid Rock being bigger than Taylor Swift?, Truth Social STILL not being on the Google Play Store, labor unions being, like, really popular, Trump bragging about having 'intel' on Macron's sex life,the big brain on Elon Musk, and Jackson, MS being without drinking water for the foreseeable future!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
